abstract: The company, which also owns Kmart, announced a loss of $548 million for its third quarter, though sales figures improved.
snippet: The company, which also owns Kmart, announced a loss of $548 million for its third quarter, though sales figures improved.
lead_paragraph: For the last year, Sears Holdings, the former retail powerhouse, has moved to carve off assets in a bid to raise cash.

headline.main: Sears Loss Widens as It Strives for Rebound
headline.print_headline: Sears Loss Widens as It Strives for Rebound
